title: Over rated and fake reviews. Waste of time.
review: A hollywood template movie that doesn't do justice to any genre. Looks like the director had no clear picture on how to take the movie forward with such a terrible plot in hand. Thriller/Horror/Sci-Fi is all you experience in the 100 minutes but it leaves you incomplete because of the abrupt genre switch and an absolute half baked story.

title: Filth
review: Avoid this garbage at all cost. Annoying characters, absolutely disgusting cast and easily one of the worst movies ever produced by Hollywood.
